column6: Nick Crane has been kidnapped by his father's murderer, a woman calling herself Black Widow. And just as he begins to unravel the mystery of the murder, a group of highly trained, heavily armed super assassins make a surprise attack on Widow!
column8: | colorist:Jim Charalampidis | inker:Travel Foreman | inker:Lorenzo Ruggiero | penciller:Manuel Garcia | editor:Ralph Macchio | letterer:Nate Piekos | writer:Duane Swierczynski
